name: An Interface With Problems
description: Personas and storyboarding give this project a framework of a problem that can be used for further design work to come up with a solution for creating simpler and more user-friendly thermostats.

name: Responsive Redesign
description: Seven Stars Bakery is a staple bakery in Rhode Island, and I was able to identify multiple usability problems with their site. Thus, I visually redesigned the app with an entirely new style guide, created lofi and hifi prototypes, and eventually built out a revamped website.

name: Iterative Design
description: To understand the process of design (brainstorming, prototyping, critiquing, and user testing), we chose a startup whose mission we resonated with and designed their product.

name: Development
description: The goal and value of the application is for users to be able to select from a dashboard of NFL players to add to their fantasy football wishlist. Built in react, I considered usabilitiy principles by adding filtering and sorting features. This application also features an aggregator, allowing users to add players to a cart while keeping track of the cart's total value.
